entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
